name: Metal Bat
description:
Wield the incredible power of the metal bat and journey inwards. The bat can be used to attack, hit bullets and manoeuvre mid-air.


Controls

Arrow Keys — Move/ direct bat swing
X — Jump
C — Swing bat

Made in 48 hours for the GameMaker's Toolkit Jam.
Background music used under the Creative Commons Attribution License:
http://freemusicarchive.org/music/Eric_Skiff/Resistor_Anthems/eric_skiff_-_05_-_...
